updated-portfolio.title: Updated Portfolio
updated-portfolio.section1: If you ever saw my old portfolio, you might remember how... clunky it felt. So, once I realized how easy Chakra UI was to work with, and how nice it looked, I knew I couldn't try to advertise my skills as a front-end developer by sticking with my original portfolio website that I built while still trying to figure out how to use React.js.

legacy-portfolio.title: Legacy Portfolio
legacy-portfolio.section1: The original portfolio I made was the first thing I ever built when I started learning React.js. As such, the code is messy, disorganized, and inconsistent. At best, it's amateur. That being said, from building that original website, I learned a TON.
